  <type>dataset</type>
  <title>Functions</title>
  <abstract>This digital geographic dataset contains point features representing address points for locations within Jefferson Parish, Louisiana. These points are normally placed at the main, front entry into residential and commercial locations. Additionally, address points exist to describe non-building structures within the Parish City where addresses have been assigned for permitting or asset tracking purposes. 

Address Points have been developed to facilitate tracking residential and commercial locations (down to specific units/suites) as well as other non-building structures where the Parish has issued permits or tracks assets. </abstract>
